thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
FlightHub gave the lowest price, shortest combined travel time, convenient departure and arriving, connection fights within the same US air company. I could not even get the same deal from that company's web site. Thanks FlightHub!
Room to improve:
1. I entered my frequent flyer number at FlightHub. It didn't show up in the air company's web for this reservation. I called the air company and they added my number so I can earn mileage and $.
2. Industry rule is 24hr free cancellation but FlightHub offered 4hr.
3. FlightHub charged a seat selection fee ($15.95) which I did not take. I directly went to the air company web and selected my seats there.
Generally happy and will come back.
